ModMetaData.name: RimVali: Far From Avalon
ModMetaData.author: Nesi The Avali, Zentimental, LiQd, Todd, Aipi, Cyasi, and Ranade
ModMetaData.description:
Welcome!
Welcome to RimVali: Far From Avalon! This mod is designed to be a large-scale avali mod, adding new mechanics, items, weapons, research, factions, materials, and so much more. After spending a year and a half in development, it's finally here.
Features
Avali! The avali are the core of this mod. Without them, nothing would exist. These cute, fluffy space raptors are weak- yet still dangerous, fast, and smart. Some avali tribes who have been living here longer then the new colonies sent by the Illuminate have adapted to the conditions on this harsh planet, and become stronger, but slower.
Scenarios When starting as an avali faction, you get two starting scenarios. Both offer unique play-styles, advantages, and disadvantages.
Packs RimVali features a highly customisable pack system (just check the settings panel, or XML files if you're a modder!), giving avali unique boosts based on the highest skills in the pack.
Being without a pack also will bring about pack-loss, so take care not to get your packmates killed, yeah?
Augments/Bionics We have over 20 augments (and maybe more planned?), each providing some boost, whether it be body part health, efficiency, or something else.
Weapons We have about 17 new guns, and 4 new melee weapons introduced in this mod. You'll find both the Illuminate and Independent Worlds have unique weaponry, such as the well known viroblade (Illuminate), modifications of stolen human technologies (Independent worlds), and more.
There also are 3 new turrets, and 2 new mortars with their own shells.
Materials A small variety of materials have been added. You'll be familiar with the orange "Ferrogel" (also known as Aerogel), but what about tungsten, or aero-tungsten carbide fiber?
Apparel The avali have their own selection of casual and combat apparel, alongside an custom textures for most vanilla and royalty armor.
And these are just a few things... I could list a lot, but we don't want to be here all day, do we?
